# kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ CFNetwork ](/documentation/cfnetwork)

- [ kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost ](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost)

-  kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost 

Global Variable# kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost

iOS 2.0–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 2.0–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedmacOS 10.2–10.11DeprecatedtvOS 9.0–9.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–1.0Deprecated

```
let kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost: CFString
```

Deprecated

Use NSURLSession API for http requests

## [Discussion](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost#Discussion)

HTTP Proxy Host property. If an HTTP CFStream is using an HTTP proxy, the value of this property is a CFString containing the host name or IP number of the proxy server.

## [See Also](/documentation/CFNetwork/kCFStreamPropertyHTTPProxyHost#see-also)
